pkgmetadata.longdescription: Directional Highest Density Regions // We provide an R tool for nonparametric plug-in estimation of Highest Density Regions (HDRs) in the directional setting. Concretely, circular and spherical regions can be reconstructed from a data sample following Saavedra-Nieves and Crujeiras (2020) arXiv:2009.08915. This library also contains two real datasets in the circular and spherical settings. The first one concerns a problem from animal orientation studies and the second one is related to earthquakes occurrences.
